commit message:
Revert 'Fix MediaController2 may leak the activity'

This reverts commit c687f766cb9c86e445290e1d65c5fb8cffb35dde.
MediaController2Lollipop: Try to fix possible memory leak
LeakCanary: Watch for the child services

Add WeakNotifiesSwitch for ActiveMode

Users explain it as:
You get a notification, you pull the phone : screen turns on
You do nothing : active mode turns off after 20 seconds (e.g.)ï»¿

NoNotifiesSwitch: Check for the notifications' events correctly

This fixes a possible issue with no ActiveMode turning on.
Settings: Remove left/right paddings from the subsettings
Put the notification's hash as the cause of turning screen on
Add an option to disable media widget
NotificationUiHelper: Check for a null before comparing bitmaps
Presenter: Don't keyguard-start the activity if it's running already
